_comment_changelog: Generate changelog from GitHub PRs/commits. Requires repo to be public or PAT with repo access.
_comment_commit: Auto-commit after 'changeset version'. Set false for manual review before committing version bumps.
_comment_access: Publish packages as public (not scoped/private). For private: 'restricted'.
_comment_baseBranch: Branch to target for release PRs. Must match workflow trigger.
_comment_updateInternalDependencies: When package A depends on package B and both get changesets, bump A's dependency on B. Options: 'patch' (conservative), 'minor' (semver-aware).
_comment_ignore: Packages excluded from versioning/publishing (e.g., docs sites, examples). Must match package.json 'name' field.
_comment_fixed: Groups of packages that always version together (uncomment if needed). Useful for tightly coupled packages.
_comment_linked: Groups that follow each other's major/minor bumps but not patches (uncomment if needed). Useful for loosely coupled packages.
